schemes.description: A conditional cash transfer scheme for pregnant and lactating women to provide financial assistance for their health and nutrition needs.
A joint federal and state program that provides health coverage for low-income individuals, including pregnant women.
A scheme that provides vouchers for pregnant women and families on low incomes to buy healthy food, vitamin supplements, and free milk.

A program that provides funding to community organizations to offer support and education on healthy eating, food preparation, and lifestyle choices to pregnant women facing social and economic challenges.
A one-off payment to help with the cost of having a baby for eligible pregnant women.
A social welfare program that provides financial assistance to low-income pregnant women for maternal and child health care, food, and education.
A conditional cash transfer program that provides financial assistance to pregnant and breastfeeding women living in poverty.
A grant that provides financial assistance to low-income pregnant women and families with children under the age of 18.
A health insurance program that provides access to affordable healthcare services for pregnant women and families in Nigeria.
A free maternal healthcare program that provides antenatal care, delivery, and postnatal care services to pregnant women in Kenya.

schemes.schemeTitle: Maternal, Newborn and Child Health Programme
schemes.description: A government initiative that provides financial assistance and access to maternal and child health care services to pregnant women and families in Bangladesh.
A health insurance program that provides free healthcare services, including maternity care, to low-income pregnant women and families in Pakistan.
A conditional cash transfer program that provides financial assistance to pregnant women and families with children under the age of 18 living in poverty.
A health insurance program that provides access to affordable healthcare services, including maternity care, to all citizens and legal residents in Thailand.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to pregnant women who are members of Japan's social security system.
A health insurance program that provides access to affordable healthcare services, including maternity care, to all citizens and legal residents in South Korea.
A health insurance program that provides access to affordable healthcare services, including maternity care, to rural residents in China.
A law that provides employment protection, paid maternity leave, and access to maternity benefits for pregnant women and new mothers in Germany.
A health care program that provides access to affordable maternity care services to all citizens and legal residents in Spain.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to low-income pregnant women and families with children under the age of 18 in Italy.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to pregnant women and new mothers in Italy.
A social welfare program that provides financial assistance to low-income pregnant women and families in Greece.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to pregnant women and new mothers in Greece.
A paid leave program that provides job protection and maternity benefits to pregnant women in Turkey.
A social welfare program that provides financial assistance to low-income pregnant women and families in Egypt.
A health insurance program that provides access to affordable maternity care services to all citizens and legal residents in Saudi Arabia.
A paid leave program that provides job protection and maternity benefits to pregnant women in the UAE.
A law that provides access to affordable maternity care services to all citizens and legal residents in Israel.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to parents, including pregnant women and new mothers, in Portugal.
A policy that provides employment protection and paid leave to pregnant women and new mothers in Belgium.
A law that provides employment protection, paid maternity leave, and access to maternity benefits for pregnant women and new mothers in the Netherlands.
A health insurance program that provides access to maternity care and other healthcare services to pregnant women and families in Switzerland.
A policy that provides employment protection and paid leave to pregnant women and new parents in Denmark.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to pregnant women and new parents in Norway.
A cash benefit that provides financial assistance to parents, including pregnant women and new mothers, in Sweden.
